description:
Anthony is just an adorable twink-like guy. He just turned 21 and as we mention in the solo, I think he has at least a decade before he will stop being carded.
He is very relaxed about the solo. He has done a lot of photo shoots, and is very comfortable being naked.
He loves snowboarding and all Winter sports, and recently moved to the mountains from the South to be near the snow and cooler weather.
He just moved, so hasn't found a girl, and also was struggling to find a job. I think is last job was trying to convince people at gas stations to have him fix their chipped windshields. A tough sell.
But I suspect, fans of twinks won't think he is a tough sell at all. He is cute and the kid has a nice cock on him.
It also helps that he is not too shy about showing off his ass.
He is down for giving head, but I don't know beyond that. I know it is a stereotype to want to see the twink get fucked, but Anthony is either very good at showcasing his ass, or really wants it to have some attention spent on it.
Anyway, enjoy his solo, and next week Brooks gives him an amazing Servicing!
title: Anthony - Solo
